title: Peru
subtitle: Air Included! Experience the Inca Jungle and Machu Picchu.
short_description: Jet from Miami, Florida to Lima, Peru for the multi-sport adventure of a lifetime. Mountain bike, whitewater raft, and hike through the Inca Jungle. Explore Machu Picchu & the Sacred Valley. This trip includes roundtrip air Miami to Lima, roundtrip air Lima to Cusco, accommodations, some meals, professional guide, ground transport & all activities.
accommodations: Shared hotel room and local-rural house
